Un fps legendaire qui a marqué beaucoup de generation incroyable

This game recently has too many updates, everytime I started the game it updates.
Unfortunately too much bandwidth and harddrive space wasted.
More than 32GB was taken for this game alone, so I decided to get rid of it.
There is no need to constantly updating a already good piece of game.
Like the old saying, don't try to fix something that isn't broken.
I do not recommend to install the game, there is nothing like the olden days of CS where it consume 1-2Gb and you would appreciate it more.
